title: Bitch Killer
description: Based on the novel by Garth Marenghi, Sidney King hates a lot of things: fruits, coloureds, and above all, women.
parent: Man to Man With Dean Learner
altHero: Randolph Caer as Sidney King holding up a chainsaw and smiling
alt2: Dean Learner as a person on the street
alt4: young woman running and screaming through some brush
